help.description: Print instructions for using the common queue commands.
help.name: help

ping.description: Ping my host server to check latency.
ping.name: ping

responses.pong: Pong! Sent response in {time}. API latency is {latency}

suggest.description: Submit a song to the queue.
suggest.name: suggest

url.description: A song link from a supported platform
url.name: url

responses.not-allowed: You're not allowed to submit songs. My apologies.

rejections.allotment-expended: You have used all {max} of your allotted submissions.
rejections.cooldown: You've already submitted a song within the last {duration}. You must wait {remaining} before submitting again.
rejections.queue-channel-submission-not-implemented: Requesting songs in the queue channel has not been implemented yet.
rejections.too-long: That song is too long. The limit is {limit}, but this is {actual} long.
rejections.too-short: That song is too short. The limit is {limit}, but this is {actual} long.

responses.this-queue-full-autoclose: This queue is full. I'm closing it now.
responses.query-returned-error: That query gave me an error. Try again maybe?
responses.queue-full-autoclose: The queue is full. I'm closing it now.
responses.queue-nearly-full: The queue is nearly full. Get your submissions in while you still can!
responses.try-supported-platform: Try a link from a supported platform.

test.description: Make sure I still know how to talk to video services.
test.name: test

responses.cannot-run-concurrent-invocations: Hold up, someone just ran this...
responses.preamble-failure: Uh, something went wrong. Best look into this:
responses.preamble-success: I ran the numbers, and it looks like we're all good!
responses.see-at-forge: See the {list} on our Git forge.

version.description: Display the bot's current codebase version.
version.name: version

common.dm-failed-disabled: I tried to DM you just now, but it looks like your DMs are off.
common.no-personal-permission: You don't have permission to run that command.
